author: Dalai Lama
message: See the positive side, the potential, and make an effort.
title: Thought of the day

author: Jane Roberts
message: By accepting yourself and being fully what you are, your presence can make others happy.
title: Thought of the day

author: Norman Cousins
message: Never deny a diagnosis, but do deny the negative verdict that may go with it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
message: The really unhappy person is the one who leaves undone what they can do, and starts doing what they don't understand; no wonder they come to grief.
title: Thought of the day
